data.question: What is the chemical formula of MOF-9?
What is the yield percentage of MOF-9 when synthesized?
What is the role of secondary building units (SBUs) in the synthesis of MOF-9?
data.answer: SBUs support the existence of large free volume in interpenetrating structures.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of MOF-9 involves the use of triethylamine.
What is the coordination number of Tb centers in MOF-9?
How many DMSO guest molecules and ligands are located per SBU in MOF-9?
data.answer: 16 DMSO guest molecules and 4 DMSO ligands

data.question: True or False: The free volume of MOF-9 is less than 20% of its crystal volume.
What is the total weight loss percentage observed in the TG analysis of MOF-9?
True or False: MOF-9 demonstrates framework stability to reversible exchange of DMSO guests.
What is the reason for the unprecedented amount of void space found in MOF-9?
data.answer: The size of SBUs is too large to fit in the space remaining after two interpenetrating frameworks form.

data.question: True or False: The presence of large free volume in MOF-9 is due to the structure not being maximally interpenetrated.
What influences the level of interpenetration in structures according to the study?
True or False: The free volume becomes larger at a high degree of interpenetration with relatively small SBUs.
What parameters are related to porosity or free volume in crystals according to the study?
data.answer: The size of SBUs and the length of linkers.

data.question: True or False: Hindering interpenetration can potentially increase the free volume in crystals.
What is the role of DMSO in the synthesis of MOF-9?
data.answer: DMSO acts as a solvent and also forms part of the structure as guest molecules and ligands.

data.question: True or False: The crystal structure of MOF-9 is cubic.
What is the significance of the Tb−O−C cluster in MOF-9?
data.answer: It serves as an optimal SBU for ADB, allowing MOF-9 to just miss a third interpenetrating framework.

data.question: What is the publication year of the study on MOF-9?
What is the primary focus of the study regarding MOF-9?
data.answer: The relationship between porosity and interpenetration of open frameworks.
